titles.title: A bill for the relief of Alice Koshian.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum in full satisfaction of any claim of a named husband and wife against the United States arising out of their purchase of two certificates of deposit in the Postal Savings System.
